name: Microsoft Dynamics CRM Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Dynamics CRM Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Microsoft Dynamics CRM API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Microsoft Dynamics CRM API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: account
available_options: Account (值: account)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create)
Delete (值: delete)
Get (值: get)
Get Many (值: getAll)
Update (值: update)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Company or business name | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: accountcategorycode (值: None) - Category to indicate whether the customer account is standard or preferred. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
accountratingcode (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
addresses (值: None)
businesstypecode (值: None) - The legal designation or other business type of the account for contracts or reporting purposes. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
customersizecode (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
customertypecode (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
description (值: None) - Additional information to describe the account, such as an excerpt from the company’s website
emailaddress1 (值: None) - The primary email address for the account
emailaddress2 (值: None) - The secondary email address for the account
emailaddress3 (值: None) - Alternate email address for the account
fax (值: None)
ftpsiteurl (值: None) - URL for the account’s FTP site to enable users to access data and share documents
industrycode (值: None) - The account’s primary industry for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
name (值: None) - Company o business name
creditlimit (值: None) - Credit limit of the account. This is a useful reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.
numberofemployees (值: None) - Number of employees that work at the account for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis
paymenttermscode (值: None) - The payment terms to indicate when the customer needs to pay the total amount. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
preferredappointmentdaycode (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
preferredappointmenttimecode (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
preferredcontactmethodcode (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
primarysatoriid (值: None)
primarytwitterid (值: None)
revenue (值: None) - The annual revenue for the account, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis
sharesoutstanding (值: None) - The number of shares available to the public for the account. This number is used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

shippingmethodcode (值: None) - Shipping method for deliveries sent to the account’s address to designate the preferred carrier or other delivery option. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
sic (值: None) - The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code that indicates the account’s primary industry of business, for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis
stageid (值: None)
stockexchange (值: None) - The stock exchange at which the account is listed to track their stock and financial performance of the company
telephone1 (值: None) - The main phone number for this account
telephone2 (值: None) - The second phone number for this account
telephone3 (值: None) - The third phone number for this account
territorycode (值: None) - Region or territory for the account for use in segmentation and analysis. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

tickersymbol (值: None) - Type the stock exchange symbol for the account to track financial performance of the company. You can click the code entered in this field to access the latest trading information from MSN Money.
websiteurl (值: None) - The account’s website URL to get quick details about the company profile
yominame (值: None) - The phonetic spelling of the company name, if specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls and other communications

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: returnFields (值: None) - Fields the response will include. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: query (值: None) - Query to filter the results. Check filters.

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
